content: Jingubang can be found in Chapter 6 in Mount Huaguo upon defeating Gold Armored Rhino, Cloudtreading Deer, Feng-Tail General, and Emerald-Armed Mantis. All of these are mandatory bosses. When defeated you can use the Somersault Cloud to head towards the trees with golden leaves and then the waterfall to progress the chapter as you reach the end.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Jingubang.md', within the main section titled 'Jingubang', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Jingubang Location'.
The content is as follows:
Jingubang can be found in Chapter 6 in Mount Huaguo upon defeating Gold Armored Rhino, Cloudtreading Deer, Feng-Tail General, and Emerald-Armed Mantis. All of these are mandatory bosses. When defeated you can use the Somersault Cloud to head towards the trees with golden leaves and then the waterfall to progress the chapter as you reach the end.
